# apisguru

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

A client to interact with the APIs.guru API.

## Installation

You can install the development version of apisguru from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jonthegeek/apisguru")
```
